author: radekkapka
content: I have a comment on https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/447 - if we make the `committee_index` query param required, then what happens when I submit a pre-Electra data root of an attestation with committee index different than what's supplied in the param? I would prefer not requiring the param in the spec so that pre-Electra behavior stays the same.

author: radekkapka
content: would be nice to have more eyes on https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/448 too

author: nflaig
content: Then we would have to separately handle the case if `committee_index` is omitted post-Electra. I would be in favor of tailoring the API towards post-Electra, could just ignore the value of the query param pre-Electra, might wanna leave it up to the implementation on how to deal with that.
